title: SLaTerStream Is Live | OCE Going To Gold

embed.description: OCE | Welcome to SLaTerStream | Doing my Promo's | Platinum Here I Come!

body:
Going for gold from S1
Send me a message I always respond to chat
Let me know if you are from the forums
#slatersquad

replies.body: Explain to me why I want to watch some silver trash fail to reach gold?
